settingsModeTitle.description: Title for the link handling mode setting

modeAllLinks.description: Option to capture all external links

modeAltClick.description: Option to capture only Alt+clicked links

modeDescription.message: Choose how the extension handles link clicks
modeDescription.description: Description for the mode selection setting

modeAllLinksDescription.message: All external links (links to other websites) will be routed through Proxly automatically
modeAllLinksDescription.description: Detailed description for all links mode

modeAltClickDescription.message: Only links clicked while holding the Alt key will be captured by Proxly

feedbackTitle.description: Title for the feedback settings section

feedbackDescription.message: Configure visual and audio feedback when links are captured
feedbackDescription.description: Description for the feedback settings section

visualFeedbackDescription.message: Display a brief visual indicator when links are captured

soundFeedbackDescription.message: Play a subtle sound when links are captured

extensionInstalled.description: Status message indicating extension is installed

checkingProxlyApp.description: Status message while checking Proxly app

proxlyAppRunning.description: Status message when Proxly app is running

proxlyAppNotRunning.message: Proxly app is not running or not responding
proxlyAppNotRunning.description: Status message when Proxly app is not running

requirementProxlyApp.message: Proxly app must be installed and running on your Mac

requirementPermissions.message: Extension requires permission to access all websites

requirementContextMenu.message: Use right-click context menu or Alt+click to capture links

accessibilitySettingsForm.description: Accessibility label for the settings form

accessibilityModeToggle.description: Accessibility label for mode toggle control

accessibilityModeHint.message: Switch between capturing all links or only Alt+clicked links

accessibilityLinkCapture.message: Link will be opened with Proxly
accessibilityLinkCapture.description: Accessibility announcement when link is captured

notificationCaptured.description: Notification text when link is successfully captured

errorProxlyNotRunning.description: Error message when Proxly app is not available

settingsSaveErrorAnnouncement.description: Screen reader announcement for settings save error

resetConfirmation.message: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to their default values?

settingsResetAnnouncement.message: Settings have been reset to default values

settingsResetError.description: Error message for failed settings reset

connectionTestError.description: Error message for failed connection test

visualFeedbackEnabled.description: Announcement when visual feedback is enabled

visualFeedbackDisabled.description: Announcement when visual feedback is disabled

soundFeedbackEnabled.description: Announcement when sound feedback is enabled

soundFeedbackDisabled.description: Announcement when sound feedback is disabled

modeChanged.description: Announcement when link handling mode is changed

1.example: Only links clicked while holding the Alt key will be captured

statusEnabled.description: Status text when extension is enabled

statusDisabled.description: Status text when extension is disabled

toggleDescription.message: When enabled, external links will be routed through Proxly
